name: Gravity Run (HitCtrl)
description:
CONTROLS: "W" or "Space" to jump.

HOW TO PLAY: Platforms switch gravity, portals..well...port you to another location =P. That's it!

This is my first game using the Godot engine. I used version 3.2 for this game. This is all I could accomplish in the time for the game jam, I learned a lot and made a lot of mistakes I am not super good a programming hahaha. I did the programming and the music and soundFX, the visual assets were free on itch.io. I primarily write music but, am slowly learning game dev. Only 2 levels made a title screen and a win screen. Enjoy and I look forward to playing the other submissions!

Cheers!

My Music: https://soundcloud.com/hitctrl
